column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Watch out Bouchon
column2: Common Bond Bakery just might be taking your place.  They have one great edge
column3: their staff is actually friendly!  We were told to go to Common Bond Bakery by a local.   We're so glad we listend.  We got the Kouigin-Amann which looks like an upside-down croissant muffin with a candied butter cap.  It was AMAZING.  We also got a cookie which was great too.  The staff
column5: was friendly which is almost as important as the food being good.
